full_text: Would y’all want this to be Superman first outfit in main canon? I’m really torn because I like the idea of Superman having the exact same suit up until his death but at the same time I love this look. https://t.co/b03Fm8kkg7
I like the idea of Bart being Wally’s successor (but done naturally) and Irey should be Bart’s successor https://t.co/KhCGrykDer
